text: before joining the program I studied
illustration of animation for a bit at
university but found that the course
wasn't really for me so I basically
stopped my studies and was kind of
unemployed for quite a while because I
didn't really know where I'd be able to
get a job without a degree so I was just
kind of doing freelance illustration in
my spare time before joining the program
I mean I hadn't really considered a
career in cloud computing somebody said
to me or maybe you could try it because
it's like a big market and you're quite
clever but I always thought oh that's
not something that I could ever really
do so I just kind of pushed it away my
advice for someone that wants to join
this program would be just apply like if
your filling has done that you might not
be able to do this job because you
haven't got any technical experience and
I relate to that because I came from an
art background but I'm been doing so
well in this course now that I can't
even understand why I would feel like
that because I think anyone can learn it
if they put their hand to it really the
phrase that I would describe this course
as is life-changing
